thread.title: BRIEF-Resmed Says Co Entered Certain Amended And Restated Credit Agreement, Dated As Of Closing Date

title: BRIEF-Resmed Says Co Entered Certain Amended And Restated Credit Agreement, Dated As Of Closing Date

organizations.name: dated as of closing date reuters

text:
April 19 (Reuters) - Resmed Inc:
* RESMED SAYS ON APRIL 17, 2018 (‘CLOSING DATE’), CO ENTERED CERTAIN AMENDED AND RESTATED CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF CLOSING DATE - SEC FILING
* RESMED INC - AGREEMENT PROVIDES CO SENIOR UNSECURED REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY IN AGGREGATE AMOUNT OF $800 MILLION
* RESMED INC - AGREEMENT PROVIDES FOR UNCOMMITTED OPTION TO INCREASE REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY BY AN ADDITIONAL $300 MILLION
* RESMED INC - AGREEMENT TERMINATES ON APRIL 17, 2023 Source text: ( bit.ly/2HfTaRA ) Further company coverage:
